Event.PageTitle: Tamil New Year Celebrations 2010 - United Kingdom
Event.MetaKeywords: sis tamil new year 2010, sis tamil new year celebrations
Event.MetaDescription: Come and join South Indian Society Tamil New Year Celebrations 2010 at Wembley, London on 24th Apr 2010.
Event.Address: Church of Ascension Hall, The Avenue, Wembley HA9 8QL.
Event.Maindescription:
Advance greetings for a very happy and prosperous Tamil New Year to your family and you from the Trustees of South Indian Society.

The welcoming of another auspicious Tamil New Year “Vikruthi” is to be marked by a gala evening for SIS Members on Saturday 24th April 2010. We will meet for a delightful evening for socialising and celebrating the Tamil New Year.

Program List

  • Prayer
  • President’s Welcome speech
  • Panchanga Patanam
  • Naadhamennum Kovilile – Veena, Flute, Violin & Mirudangam by young artistes
  • Kalaikalil Siranthathu - Dances from Tamil Nadu
  • Ilainjar Ulagam : Kamban Emanthaan – Tamil Comedy Skit
  • Kathak Dance
  • Vote of Thanks
  • Dinner

Admission: £ 6 for members, £ 10 for non-members and £ 4 for children 5 to 12 years.

Members who have their subscriptions outstanding are requested to kindly use this opportunity to pay off the dues.

Please confirm your attendance before 17th April to one of the Trustees or send a confirmation mail to southindiansociety.london2010@googlemail.com

Looking forward to meeting you all soon.

]]>
